languages.text: "Все-то вы исковеркали! А взглянули бы хоть раз в глаза Звездн{rt_mf|ому|ой} Госпо{rt_mf|дину|же}, поняли бы, сколь он{rt_mf||а} светозар{rt_mf|ен|на}. Что ни велит — чуешь нутром, то Бог-Император {rt_mf|его|ее} устами вещает, то истина! А кто мы такие, чтобы истину Его постичь?"
languages.translation_comment: убрать, если заставили ползать в грязи

traits.locale_text: "Звездн{mf|ому|ой} Госпо{mf|дину|же} ваши жизни — что плевок под сапогом. Хочет — милует, хочет — казнит. Все в {mf|его|ее} власти".

languages.translation_comment: убрать, если заставили ползать в грязи

languages.text: "You just had to twist the story every which way! If you only looked into the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s eyes even once, you'd realise how full of light {rt_mf|he|she} is. Whenever {rt_mf|he|she} orders something done, you can feel it in your heart that it's the God-Emperor talking through {rt_mf|him|her}. That it's the truth! And who are we to fathom His truth?"
languages.original_text: "Все-то вы исковеркали! А взглянули бы хоть раз в глаза Звездн{rt_mf|ому|ой} Госпо{rt_mf|дину|же}, поняли бы, сколь он{rt_mf||а} светозар{rt_mf|ен|на}. Что ни велит — чуешь нутром, то Бог-Император {rt_mf|его|ее} устами вещает, то истина! А кто мы такие, чтобы истину Его постичь?"

traits.locale_text: "You just had to twist the story every which way! If you only looked into the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord's|Lady's} eyes once, you'd realise how full of light {rt_mf|he|she} is. Whenever {rt_mf|he|she} orders something done, you can feel it in your gut that it's the Gold-Emperor talking through {rt_mf|him|her}. That it's the truth! And who are we to fathom His truth?"

"You just had to twist the story every which way! If you only looked into the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord's|Lady's} eyes once, you'd realise how full of light {rt_mf|he|she} is. Whenever {rt_mf|he|she} orders something done, you can feel it in your gut that it's the Gold-Emperor talking through {rt_mf|him|her}. That it's the truth! And who are we to fathom His truth?"

Whenever {rt_mf|he|she} orders something done, you can feel it in your heart that it's the God-Emperor talking through {rt_mf|him|her}. That it's the truth! And who are we to fathom His truth?"

Whenever {rt_mf|he|she} orders something done, you can feel it in your heart that it's the God-Emperor talking through {rt_mf|him|her}. That it's the truth! And who are we to fathom His truth?"

languages.text: “简直是胡说八道，这么离谱的话到底是哪里听来的？只要你亲眼看着那位大人的眼睛，就能看到{rt_mf|他|她}无比纯洁的灵魂。无论{rt_mf|他|她}吩咐你做什么事情，你都发自内心地感受到，那就是神皇本人通过{rt_mf|他|她}的话语在传达命令，就是这样！我们不过是凡人，哪里能揣测得了祂的真理呢？”
languages.original_text: "You just had to twist the story every which way! If you only looked into the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s eyes even once, you'd realise how full of light {rt_mf|he|she} is. Whenever {rt_mf|he|she} orders something done, you can feel it in your heart that it's the God-Emperor talking through {rt_mf|him|her}. That it's the truth! And who are we to fathom His truth?"

traits.locale_text: “简直是胡说八道，这么离谱的话到底是哪里听来的？只要你亲眼看着那位大人的眼睛，就能看到{rt_mf|他|她}无比纯洁的灵魂。无论{rt_mf|他|她}吩咐你做什么事情，你都发自内心地感受到，那就是神皇本人通过{rt_mf|他|她}的话语在传达命令，就是这样！我们不过是凡人，哪里能揣测得了祂的真理呢？”
“简直是胡说八道，这么离谱的话到底是哪里听来的？只要你亲眼看着那位大人的眼睛，就能看到{rt_mf|他|她}无比纯洁的灵魂。无论{rt_mf|他|她}吩咐你做什么事情，你都会在冥冥之中意识到，那就是神皇本人通过{rt_mf|他|她}的话语在传达命令，就是这样！我们不过是凡人，哪里能揣测得了祂的真理呢？”

languages.text: «¡Esa historia está totalmente distorsionada! Si hubierais mirado a{rt_mf|l Señor| la Señora} Celestial a los ojos una sola vez, sabríais lo llen{rt_mf|o|a} de luz que está. Cada vez que ordena algo, puedes sentir en tu corazón que el Dios Emperador habla a través de {rt_mf|él|ella}. ¡Esa es la verdad! Y ¿quiénes somos nosotros para comprender Su verdad?».
languages.original_text: "You just had to twist the story every which way! If you only looked into the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s eyes even once, you'd realise how full of light {rt_mf|he|she} is. Whenever {rt_mf|he|she} orders something done, you can feel it in your heart that it's the God-Emperor talking through {rt_mf|him|her}. That it's the truth! And who are we to fathom His truth?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Esa historia está totalmente distorsionada! Si hubierais mirado a{rt_mf|l Señor| la Señora} Celestial a los ojos una sola vez, sabríais lo llen{rt_mf|o|a} de luz que está. Cada vez que ordena algo, puedes sentir en tu corazón que el Dios Emperador habla a través de {rt_mf|él|ella}. ¡Esa es la verdad! Y ¿quiénes somos nosotros para comprender Su verdad?».

languages.text: "Olayı çarpıtmayı bırak! Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} gözlerine bir kez baksan içinin nasıl nurla dolu olduğunu anlarsın. O ne buyursa Tanrı İmparator'un onun ağzından konuştuğunu hissedersin. Hakikat budur! Biz kimiz ki O'nun hakikatini sorgulayalım?"
languages.original_text: "You just had to twist the story every which way! If you only looked into the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s eyes even once, you'd realise how full of light {rt_mf|he|she} is. Whenever {rt_mf|he|she} orders something done, you can feel it in your heart that it's the God-Emperor talking through {rt_mf|him|her}. That it's the truth! And who are we to fathom His truth?"

traits.locale_text: "Olayı çarpıtmayı bırak! Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} gözlerine bir kez baksan içinin nasıl nurla dolu olduğunu anlarsın. O ne buyursa Tanrı İmparator'un onun ağzından konuştuğunu hissedersin. Hakikat budur! Biz kimiz ki O'nun hakikatini sorgulayalım?"
"Hayatlarınız, Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} çizmelerinin altındaki kirden farksız. İstediğini bağışlar, istediğini mahkûm eder ve bunu yaparken bir güzel güler. Nihai güce sahip."

languages.text: 「あなたは話をねじ曲げ続けてばっかじゃない！一度でも天の{rt_mf|君|姫}の目を直視してみて。{rt_mf|彼|彼女}がどれだけ光に満ちているか、わかるはずだよ。{rt_mf|彼|彼女}が何かをお命じになる時、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}を通じて神帝陛下が語っていることが感じ取れるのだ！私たちに陛下の真理を推し量る資格があるわけないよね？」
languages.original_text: "You just had to twist the story every which way! If you only looked into the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s eyes even once, you'd realise how full of light {rt_mf|he|she} is. Whenever {rt_mf|he|she} orders something done, you can feel it in your heart that it's the God-Emperor talking through {rt_mf|him|her}. That it's the truth! And who are we to fathom His truth?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは話をねじ曲げ続けてばっかじゃない！一度でも天の{rt_mf|君|姫}の目を直視してみて。{rt_mf|彼|彼女}がどれだけ光に満ちているか、わかるはずだよ。{rt_mf|彼|彼女}が何かをお命じになる時、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}を通じて神帝陛下が語っていることが感じ取れるのだ！私たちに陛下の真理を推し量る資格があるわけないよね？」

languages.text: « Ne raconte pas n'importe quoi ! Il suffit de regarder dans les yeux de Sa Céleste Seigneurie pour voir qu'{rt_mf|il est empli|elle est emplie} de lumière. Chaque fois qu'{rt_mf|il|elle} donne un ordre, on sent au plus profond de notre âme que c'est l'Empereur-Dieu qui parle à travers {rt_mf|lui|elle} pour exprimer Sa vérité ! Et comment pourrions-nous la comprendre ? »
languages.original_text: "You just had to twist the story every which way! If you only looked into the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s eyes even once, you'd realise how full of light {rt_mf|he|she} is. Whenever {rt_mf|he|she} orders something done, you can feel it in your heart that it's the God-Emperor talking through {rt_mf|him|her}. That it's the truth! And who are we to fathom His truth?"

traits.locale_text: « Ne raconte pas n'importe quoi ! Il suffit de regarder dans les yeux de Sa Céleste Seigneurie pour voir qu'{rt_mf|il est empli|elle est emplie} de lumière. Chaque fois qu'{rt_mf|il|elle} donne un ordre, on sent au plus profond de notre âme que c'est l'Empereur-Dieu qui parle à travers {rt_mf|lui|elle} pour exprimer Sa vérité ! Et comment pourrions-nous la comprendre ? »

languages.text: "Ihr musstet die Geschichte ja nach Eurem Belieben verdrehen! Hättet Ihr auch nur einmal in die Augen {rt_mf|des himmlischen Herren|der himmlischen Herrin} geblickt, wüsstet Ihr, was für eine Lichtgestalt {rt_mf|er|sie} ist. Wenn {rt_mf|er|sie} etwas anordnet, spürt man im Herzen, dass der Gottimperator durch {rt_mf|ihn|sie} spricht. Das ist die Wahrheit! Und wie könnten wir Seine Wahrheit verstehen?"
languages.original_text: "You just had to twist the story every which way! If you only looked into the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s eyes even once, you'd realise how full of light {rt_mf|he|she} is. Whenever {rt_mf|he|she} orders something done, you can feel it in your heart that it's the God-Emperor talking through {rt_mf|him|her}. That it's the truth! And who are we to fathom His truth?"

Wenn {rt_mf|er|sie} etwas anordnet, spürt man im Herzen, dass der Gottimperator durch {rt_mf|ihn|sie} spricht. Das ist die Wahrheit! Und wie könnten wir Seine Wahrheit verstehen?"
